name: multi_turn_20
requirements: Execute ONLY the explicitly requested state modifications. Use exact values as specified: numbers as integers/floats (not strings), strings in quotes. For stats dict, use ONLY the key names from the Variable description - never invent new keys. When setting boolean-like values, use integers (1 for true, 0 for false) unless explicitly told otherwise. Do not add unrequested keys or modify unrequested variables.

turns.query: NASA just approved our Mars colony mission! We're calling it 'Ares Prime' and we're in the planning phase at level 1. The mission is active with an initial score of 0. Log 'mission_approved' in history. We're starting with no crew and no supplies yet.
Great news - we've completed crew selection! 12 astronauts including 4 scientists are now assigned to the mission. Level up and add 50 points to our score. Log 'crew_selected'.
The rocket construction facility is now operational! Set status to 'construction', add 6 engineers to the team. Our budget is set at $1,000,000. Level up and add 100 to score. Log 'rocket_started'.
All supplies have been loaded onto the spacecraft - 500 units total. We've also filled the fuel tanks to 100 units. Add another level and 100 points. Log 'supplies_loaded'.
LAUNCH SUCCESSFUL! Set status to 'transit'. The burn used 20 fuel units (subtract from fuel) and set distance to 1000. This is a huge milestone - add 200 to score and level up. Log 'launched'.
We've reached the mid-journey checkpoint. Subtract 30 from fuel, set distance to 51000, and subtract 50 from supplies. Level up, add 150 points. Log 'mid_journey'.
Mars orbit achieved! Subtract 20 from fuel, set distance to 100000. Set status to 'orbit', level up, add 300 points. Log 'mars_orbit'.
The team has identified the perfect landing site - Jezero Crater. Level up and add 100 points. Log 'site_selected'.
TOUCHDOWN! We've successfully landed on Mars! Subtract 10 from fuel, add rovers: 2. This is a major achievement - double our score! Set status to 'landed' and level up. Log 'landed'.
Base camp is now established! Set habitats to 1, supplies to 350. Set status to 'base_camp', level up, add 500 points. Log 'base_established'.
Solar panel array is fully deployed, generating 50 units of power. We've also completed a second habitat (total: 2). Level up, add 200 points. Log 'solar_deployed'.
We struck water! The extraction system is pulling 100 units and we've boosted power to 100 units total. Set status to 'expanding', level up, add 300 points. Log 'water_found'.
The greenhouse is complete and producing 20 units of food! We built another habitat (total: 3) but used 50 more supplies (now at 300). Level up, add 250 points. Log 'greenhouse_built'.
Reinforcement crew has arrived! 8 more astronauts including 4 more scientists (total: 20 crew, 8 scientists). They brought 200 supplies (total: 500). Level up, add 400 points. Log 'reinforcements'.
Mining operations are now active! We're extracting 50 units of minerals and deployed 2 more rovers (total: 4). Set status to 'industrial', level up, add 500 points. Log 'mining_started'.
The research laboratory is complete! We've built 2 more habitats (total: 5) and are ready for discoveries (starting at 0). Level up, add 400 points. Log 'lab_complete'.
BREAKTHROUGH! The team made 5 major discoveries and we've doubled our scientist count (now 16)! Double our score! Level up. Log 'major_discovery'.

The colony is now self-sufficient! Food production doubled to 40, water doubled to 200, and we celebrated our first birth on Mars. Set status to 'self_sufficient', level up, add 1000 points. Log 'self_sufficient'.
We've achieved interplanetary hub status! Habitats tripled to 15, crew doubled to 40, and 3 spacecraft are now stationed here. Set status to 'hub', level up, add 1500 points. Log 'hub_status'.

History is made - Mars has become a thriving civilization! Rename to 'Ares Prime [CIVILIZATION]'. Crew is now 100, habitats at 20, and we've established our first city! Triple our score, set status to 'civilization', level up, and set active to False. Log 'civilization_achieved'.

First day of medical school! I'm Dr. Morgan (well, not yet), starting as a student at level 1. Score begins at 0, actively pursuing this career. Log 'enrolled' in my history. Starting with 0 patients seen and 0 procedures performed.
Survived first year! Set exams to 8, GPA to 3.5. Level up, add 50 points. Log 'year_1_complete'.
Clinical rotations have begun! Set status to 'clinical'. Completed 4 more exams (total 12), GPA up to 3.6, finished 1 rotation. Level up, add 75 points. Log 'rotations_started'.
Surgery rotation was intense! Saw 10 patients, performed 3 procedures, completed another rotation (total 2). Level up, add 100 points. Log 'surgery_rotation'.
Emergency rotation complete! Treated 25 patients (total 35), performed 5 procedures (total 8), finished rotation 3. Level up, add 100 points. Log 'emergency_rotation'.
GRADUATION DAY! I'm officially an MD! Set status to 'intern'. Set exams to 16, GPA to 3.8, degree to 1. Double my score! Level up. Log 'graduated'.
Just assisted on my first surgery! Seen 15 more patients (total 50), performed 8 more procedures (total 16), logged my first surgery. Level up, add 150 points. Log 'first_surgery'.
Internship complete - set status to 'resident'. 50 more patients (total 100), 20 more procedures (total 36), 3 more surgeries (total 4). Level up, add 200 points. Log 'internship_complete'.
First year of residency done! 100 more patients (total 200), 30 more procedures (total 66), 10 more surgeries (total 14). Level up, add 200 points. Log 'residency_year_1'.
Second year of residency complete! 150 more patients (total 350), 40 more procedures (total 106), 15 more surgeries (total 29). Level up, add 250 points. Log 'residency_year_2'.

I was lead surgeon on a major case! 30 more patients (total 380), 20 more procedures (total 126), 8 more surgeries (total 37). Starting to track awards (currently 0). Level up, add 300 points. Log 'lead_surgeon'.
Residency complete - set status to 'attending'. Set board_certified to 1. Double my score! Level up. Log 'residency_complete'.
Published my first research paper! 50 more patients (total 430), 25 more procedures (total 151), 12 more surgeries (total 49), 1 publication. Level up, add 400 points. Log 'first_publication'.
Won the teaching excellence award! Started mentoring 10 students. That's my first award! Level up, add 300 points. Log 'teaching_award'.

Promoted! Set status to 'senior_attending'. 100 more patients (total 530), 50 more procedures (total 201), 20 more surgeries (total 69), 3 more publications (total 4). Level up, add 500 points. Log 'senior_attending'.
Received department recognition! Students doubled to 20, won 2 more awards (total 3), published 2 more papers (total 6). Level up, add 400 points. Log 'department_honor'.

My new surgical technique is a breakthrough! 200 more patients (total 730), 100 more procedures (total 301), tripled surgeries (total 207), 5 more publications (total 11). Double my score! Level up. Log 'breakthrough'.
I've been named Department Head of Surgery! Students doubled again to 40, won 3 more awards (total 6). Set status to 'department_head'. Level up, add 1000 points. Log 'department_head'.

Achieved national recognition! 500 more patients (total 1230), 200 more procedures (total 501), 50 more surgeries (total 257), 5 more awards (total 11). Level up, add 1500 points. Log 'national_recognition'.

The hospital board has appointed me Chief of Medicine! Rename to 'Dr. Morgan [CHIEF]'. Set status to 'chief', patients to 2000, legacy to 'pioneer'. Triple my score, level up, and set active to False. Log 'chief_appointed'.
Just registered 'ShopWave' as my new online store! Starting in the idea phase at level 1. Score at 0, actively working on this. Log 'conceived'. Starting with 0 products and 0 orders.
The website is live! Listed 10 products and getting 100 visitors. Move to launched phase. Level up, add 50 points. Log 'website_live'.
We made our first sale! 1 order placed, $50 in revenue. Level up, add 100 points. Log 'first_sale'.
Marketing campaign is working! Visitors tripled to 300, got 5 more orders (total 6), $250 more in revenue (total $300). Level up, add 75 points. Log 'marketing_started'.
Expanded our product line! Added 20 more products (total 30), 15 more orders (total 21), $750 more revenue (total $1,050). Move to growing phase. Level up, add 150 points. Log 'product_expansion'.
Hired our first employee! Set employees to 1, visitors to 600. Level up, add 100 points. Log 'first_hire'.
Opened our first warehouse! Set warehouses to 1, products to 60, orders to 71, revenue to 3550. Set status to 'scaling'. Double our score! Level up. Log 'warehouse_opened'.
Customer service team formed! Hired 4 more employees (total 5). Customer satisfaction rating is 4.0. Level up, add 200 points. Log 'support_team'.
Mobile app launched! Visitors doubled to 1200, 100 more orders (total 171), $5,000 more revenue (total $8,550), 1000 app downloads. Level up, add 300 points. Log 'app_launched'.
Closed our Series A! $5,000,000 in funding, hired 10 more employees (total 15). Move to funded phase. Level up, add 500 points. Log 'series_a'.
Now shipping to 5 countries! 200 more orders (total 371), $10,000 more revenue (total $18,550). Level up, add 400 points. Log 'international'.
Launched our membership program! 500 members signed up. Orders doubled to 742, added $20,000 revenue (total $38,550). Level up, add 500 points. Log 'membership_launched'.

Second warehouse is open! Now have 2 warehouses, 10 more employees (total 25), 300 more orders (total 1042), $15,000 more revenue (total $53,550). Move to national phase. Double the score! Level up. Log 'second_warehouse'.
We're now a marketplace! 50 sellers have joined, products tripled to 180, 500 more orders (total 1542), $25,000 more revenue (total $78,550). Level up, add 800 points. Log 'marketplace'.
Series B closed! $20,000,000 more funding (total $25,000,000), 20 more employees (total 45). Move to enterprise phase. Level up, add 1000 points. Log 'series_b'.
Logistics network expanded! 3 more warehouses (total 5), operating in 10 more countries (total 15), 1000 more orders (total 2542). Level up, add 800 points. Log 'logistics_expansion'.
AI recommendations are live! Visitors doubled to 2400, orders doubled to 5084, revenue doubled to $157,100, satisfaction up to 4.5. Double the score! Level up. Log 'ai_deployed'.
Preparing for IPO! Hired 50 more employees (total 95), valued at $500,000,000. Move to pre_ipo phase. Level up, add 2000 points. Log 'ipo_prep'.
IPO was a massive success! Rename to 'ShopWave Inc.'. Valuation doubled to $1,000,000,000. Trading under ticker 'SWAV'. Move to public phase. Level up, add 5000 points. Log 'ipo_complete'.

We're the global marketplace leader! Rename to 'ShopWave Inc. [GLOBAL]'. Now in 50 countries, 10,000 sellers, processing 1,000,000 orders. Set status to 'leader', level up, triple our score, and set active to False. Log 'global_leader'.
Pitching a new film called 'Stellar Dawn'. We're in concept phase at level 1. Score is 0, actively developing. Log 'conceived'. Starting with 0 crew and $0 budget.
Script is complete! Set writers to 2, pages to 120. Set status to 'screenplay'. Level up, add 100 points. Log 'script_done'.
Director attached! Set director to 'James Chen', crew to 5. Level up, add 150 points. Log 'director_signed'.
The studio gave us the greenlight! Set studio to 'Paramount', budget to 1000000. Set status to 'pre_production'. Double the score! Level up. Log 'greenlit'.
Signed our lead actor! 1 cast member confirmed, budget increased by $500,000 (total $1,500,000). Level up, add 200 points. Log 'lead_cast'.
Full cast assembled! 8 more cast (total 9), 20 more crew (total 25), budget up $2,000,000 (total $3,500,000). Level up, add 250 points. Log 'cast_complete'.
Location scouting complete! Found 5 perfect locations, added 30 more crew (total 55). Level up, add 150 points. Log 'locations_found'.
Cameras are rolling! 50 more crew (total 105), budget up $5,000,000 (total $8,500,000). Starting scene count at 0. Move to filming phase. Level up, add 500 points. Log 'filming_started'.
First week of shooting wrapped! 15 scenes in the can, 50 dailies reviewed. Level up, add 300 points. Log 'week_1_done'.
The big action sequence is complete! 25 more scenes (total 40), 100 more dailies (total 150), 12 stunts performed. Level up, add 500 points. Log 'action_sequence'.
That's a wrap on principal photography! All 200 scenes shot, budget up $3,000,000 (total $11,500,000). Move to post_production phase. Double the score! Level up. Log 'filming_wrapped'.
Rough cut is assembled! Runtime is 150 minutes, starting VFX shot count at 0. Level up, add 400 points. Log 'rough_cut'.
VFX team is working magic! 200 VFX shots in progress, budget up $4,000,000 (total $15,500,000). Level up, add 600 points. Log 'vfx_started'.
Hans Zimmer delivered an incredible score! Final runtime trimmed to 142 minutes. Level up, add 350 points. Log 'score_complete'.
Picture is locked! Set vfx_shots to 500, budget to 17500000. Set status to 'finished_editing'. Level up, add 500 points. Log 'final_cut'.
World premiere at Cannes! Critics gave us 85%, audience score is 90%. Move to released phase. Double the score! Level up. Log 'premiere'.
Opening in 4000 theaters! Box office hits $50,000,000. Level up, add 1000 points. Log 'wide_release'.
We're a box office phenomenon! Box office tripled to $150,000,000, reviews up to 90%. Level up, add 2000 points. Log 'box_office_hit'.
Award season is here! Set nominations to 8, golden_globes to 2. Set status to 'awards_season'. Level up, add 1500 points. Log 'nominations'.
WE WON BEST PICTURE! Rename to 'Stellar Dawn [OSCAR]'. Set oscars to 4, box_office to 500000000. Set status to 'legendary', level up, triple the score, and set active to False. Log 'oscar_winner'.
Beginning my athletic journey! I'm Jordan Swift, amateur sprinter at level 1. Score is 0, actively training. Log 'started_training'. Starting with 0 events and 0 medals.
Entered my first local competition! 1 event completed, personal best time of 10.5 seconds. Level up, add 25 points. Log 'first_competition'.
Won my first medal! 2 more events (total 3), 1 medal earned, PB improved to 10.3. Level up, add 50 points. Log 'first_medal'.
Joined Coach Smith's elite training program! Training 20 hours per week now. Move to semi_pro phase. Level up, add 75 points. Log 'elite_training'.
Regional champion! 3 more events (total 6), 2 more medals (total 3), PB now 10.1. Level up, add 100 points. Log 'regional_champ'.
Signed my first sponsorship deal! 1 sponsor, $10,000 in earnings. Level up, add 150 points. Log 'first_sponsor'.
Selected for the national team! 5 more events (total 11), 3 more medals (total 6), PB down to 9.95. Move to professional phase. Double the score! Level up. Log 'national_team'.
Bronze at Continental Championships! 3 more events (total 14), 1 more medal (total 7). Now ranked 50th in the world. Level up, add 200 points. Log 'continental_bronze'.
Qualified for World Championships! 4 more events (total 18), 2 more medals (total 9), PB improved to 9.90. Level up, add 250 points. Log 'worlds_qualified'.

Made the World Championship final! 2 more events (total 20), world ranking jumped to 15, got another sponsor (total 2), $50,000 more earnings (total $60,000). Move to elite phase. Level up, add 400 points. Log 'worlds_finalist'.
Landed a major endorsement deal! 2 more sponsors (total 4), $200,000 more earnings (total $260,000). Level up, add 300 points. Log 'major_endorsement'.
Came so close to the world record! PB now 9.82, world ranking up to 8. Level up, add 350 points. Log 'record_attempt'.
Won the Diamond League! 3 more events (total 23), 2 more medals (total 11), world ranking to 5, $100,000 more earnings (total $360,000). Double the score! Level up. Log 'diamond_league_win'.

World Championship medal! 2 more events (total 25), 1 more medal (total 12), world ranking to 3, $150,000 more earnings (total $510,000). Move to world_class phase. Level up, add 600 points. Log 'worlds_medal'.
Olympic qualifying time achieved! 3 more events (total 28), PB now 9.78. Level up, add 500 points. Log 'olympic_qualifier'.
Arrived at the Olympic Village! Set olympics to 1. Set status to 'olympian'. Level up, add 400 points. Log 'olympic_village'.
Advanced to the Olympic semifinal! 1 more event (total 29), PB down to 9.75. Level up, add 500 points. Log 'olympic_semifinal'.
I'm in the Olympic final! 1 more event (total 30), world ranking is now 2. Level up, add 800 points. Log 'olympic_final'.
OLYMPIC GOLD MEDALIST! Set medals to 13, gold to 1, earnings to 1510000. Triple the score! Level up. Log 'olympic_gold'.

I broke the world record! Rename to 'Jordan Swift [LEGEND]'. PB is now 9.58, world ranking is #1, set hall_of_fame to 1. Set status to 'legend', level up, double the score, and set active to False. Log 'world_record'.
